description: This file defines a class 'DocumentKnowledgeBase' that extends 'AgentKnowledge' and provides methods to iterate over a list of 'Document' objects, both synchronously and asynchronously.

classes.name: DocumentKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class that manages a collection of Document objects and provides methods to iterate over them synchronously and asynchronously.

methods.name: document_lists
methods.description: A property that yields lists of Document objects synchronously.

methods.name: async_document_lists
methods.description: An asynchronous property that yields lists of Document objects asynchronously.
